type_header_font.label: Font
type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

quick_view_enabled.label: Enable quick view feature
quick_view_enabled.info: View product details in a popup without leaving the current page.

color_swatches_enabled.label: Enable swatches feature
color_swatches_enabled.info: Displays color options in swatches that allows you to quickly select on the product card.

shipping_calculator_default_country.label: Default country to use
shipping_calculator_default_country.info: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected.

header__1.info: Make sure that you have properly configured your [shipping rates](/admin/settings/shipping)

free_shipping_minimum_amount.label: Free shipping minimum amount
free_shipping_minimum_amount.info: Enter amount using number only. If using multiple currencies, separate each currency code with its amount (e.g: USD:100, EUR:95, JPY:13000)

header__2.info: Dynamic recommendations are based on the items in your cart. They change and improve with time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

improve_page_rendering.label: Improve page rendering
improve_page_rendering.info: It will defer the rendering of elements until they're about to hit the viewport. [Learn more](https://roartheme.co/blogs/support/improve-page-rendering)

header.info: Gradient replaces solid colors when set.

heading_tag.label: Heading tag
heading_tag.info: Specify heading code types for SEO and search engines for crawling purposes.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

image_position.label: Image focal point
image_position.info: Used to keep the subject of your image in view.
image_position.info_plural: Used to keep the subject of your images in view.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/os20/themes-by-shopify/dawn/page-types#product-recommendations-show-product-rating)

enable_image_fill.label: Zoom image to fill space
enable_image_fill.info: Have no effect when grid image size is set to "Adapt to image".

mode.label: Display mode
mode.info: In "Test mode", the popup always displays despite the relevant settings or dismissing so that you can review it all the time. When satisfied with the look, switch to "Enable".

expiry.label: Frequency
expiry.info: Number of days before a dismissed popup reappears.

paragraph.content: Does not appear on mobile in order to meet Google's [interstitial guidelines](https://developers.google.com/search/blog/2016/08/helping-users-easily-access-content-on) for improved SEO.

image_position.label: Desktop position
image_position.info: If the position is either left or right, it requires "Popup width" equal to or greater than 720px.

paragraph__1.content: Requires carousel style to be enabled.

paragraph__2.content: Requires marquee style to be enabled.

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

layout.label: Desktop layout
layout.info: Image first is the default mobile layout.

paragraph.content: Dynamic recommendations are based on the items in your cart. They change and improve with time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

video_url.label: URL
video_url.info: Videos play in a pop-up if the section contains other blocks.
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo link

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video for customers using screen readers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video)

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if list includes more collections than shown

paragraph.content: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.
Custom fields are used to collect customization information via your contact form.

required.label: Required
required.info: If you use "Required" with a checkbox, then the checkbox will need to be checked for the customer to add the item to the cart.

header__1.info: Requires line item property type to be "Checkbox".

header__2.info: Requires line item property type to be "Radio buttons".

header__3.info: Requires line item property type to be "Dropdown list".

options.label: Options
options.info: Separate your options with a comma (e.g: Option 1, Option 2, Option 3)

button_label_1.label: Accept button label
button_label_1.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_label_2.label: Decline button label
button_label_2.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

paragraph.content: Ask your customers for consent to use cookies and process their data, as required by the European Union's ePrivacy Directive and General Data Protection Regulation. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/your-account/privacy/GDPR)

mode.label: Display mode
mode.info: In "Test mode", the banner always displays despite the relevant settings or dismissing so that you can review it all the time. When satisfied with the look, switch to "Enable".

delay.label: Delay
delay.info: Delay is disabled in theme editor for visibility.

message.label: Message
message.info: Message when the countdown has reached 0.

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if blog includes more blog posts than shown

image_ratio.info: For best results, use an image with a 2:3 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if collection has more products than shown

layout.label: Desktop layout
layout.info: Media first is the default mobile layout.

hide_variants.label: Hide other variants' media after selecting a variant

header__2.info: The first 4 images will be used if product has 4 or more. Other media types will be ignored.

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: Heading required to display the menu.

alignment.label: Desktop content alignment
alignment.info: Center is the default mobile layout.

header__1.info: Subscribers added automatically to your "accepted marketing" customer list [customer list.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header__2.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

header__3.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

header__4.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header__6.info: To add store policies, go to your [policy settings](/admin/settings/legal).

logo_position.label: Desktop logo position
logo_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile.

show_sticky_header_scroll_up.label: Show sticky header when customers scroll up
show_sticky_header_scroll_up.info: Requires sticky header to be enabled.

enable_transparent_header_custom.label: Custom pages
enable_transparent_header_custom.info: Pick a menu containing items linked to the pages you want to apply the transparent header. [Learn more](https://roartheme.co/blogs/beyours/enable-transparent-header-on-custom-pages)

transparent_logo.label: Logo image
transparent_logo.info: Displayed when transparent header is enabled.

header__3.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

header__4.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

paragraph.content: The mega menu is displayed on desktop only and requires the "Enable dropdown menu" option in section settings.

menu_title.label: Menu item
menu_title.info: Enter the name of the menu item you'd like to apply a mega menu. [Learn more](https://roartheme.co/blogs/beyours/how-to-create-a-mega-menu)

layout.label: Desktop layout
layout.info: Images first is the default mobile layout.

image_height.label: Featured image height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images)

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store)

image_ratio.info: For best results, use an image with a 2:3 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

paragraph.content: To change excerpts, edit your [blog posts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/blogs/writing-blogs#display-an-excerpt-from-a-blog-post)
Make sure that you have properly configured your [shipping rates](/admin/settings/shipping)

minimum_amount.label: Free shipping minimum amount
minimum_amount.info: Enter amount using number only. If using multiple currencies, separate each currency code with its amount (e.g: USD:100, EUR:95, JPY:13000)

paragraph.content: Add a description or image by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)

image_ratio.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

enable_sticky_facet.label: Enable sticky toolbar
enable_sticky_facet.info: Toolbar shows on the screen as customers scroll up.

enable_filtering.label: Enable filtering
enable_filtering.info: Allow your customers to filter results by product availability, price, color, and more. [Customize filters](/admin/menus)

filtering_max_items.label: Number of items to show more

filter_type.label: Desktop filter layout
filter_type.info: Drawer is the default mobile layout.

paragraph.content: Links to collections from your menu will appear here. [Learn more](https://roartheme.co/blogs/beyours/how-do-i-create-subcollections)

paragraph__1.content: Requires variant picker type to be "Button".

paragraph__2.content: Products that are eligible for size chart function [must have a Size option](https://roartheme.co/blogs/beyours/how-to-enable-size-chart-on-product-pages)

show_inventory_transfer.label: Show inventory transfer notice
show_inventory_transfer.info: Learn how to create inventory transfers [here](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/inventory/transfers/create-transfer)

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images)

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store)

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

required.label: Required
required.info: If you use "Required" with a checkbox, then the checkbox will need to be checked for the customer to add the item to the cart.

icon.info: Visible when collapsible row is displayed.
